plot: The story of a boy whose only friend is a snowball. As the snowball gets bigger he finds it harder and harder to play with him.
title: The Snowball
plot_es: The story of a boy whose only friend is a snowball. As the snowball gets bigger he finds it harder and harder to play with him.
plot_en: The story of a boy whose only friend is a snowball. As the snowball gets bigger he finds it harder and harder to play with him.
